content: this is a summary of a legal case in slovenia identified as case n° sodba vrhovnega sodišča rs ii ips 2942018 11102018 the case involves two parties but the specific details are not provided the supreme court made a judgment on october 11 2018 but the details of the judgment are not mentioned the plaintiff was awarded costs of 217048 eur in the first instance judgment which the defendant is responsible for paying the legal procedure lasted until october 11 2018 the case involves a real estate property with the judgment confirming equal ownership between the plaintiff and the defendant the supreme court has granted permission to review the case the main issue is whether the courts violated the defendants right to present evidence and whether the defendant provided enough proof to support their claims the evidence relates to the defendants sale of timber forests and the use of the proceeds for the familys needs the judgment has been revised to address violations of the defendants rights and the sufficiency of evidence the defendant argues they made a significant contribution to the jointly owned property the court ruled that the defendant must pay the plaintiff 217048 eur for legal costs the court of appeal upheld the judgment and the defendant is seeking permission to appeal the main issues are the failure to hear witnesses and the equal division of coowned property the court needs to assess the shares of the property consider financial contributions and any additional benefits received by the defendant the court also needs to consider the evidence and make a decision based on the law the supreme court has admitted the case for review
